resolve(); },timmer); }) } //åˆ©ç”¨promiseç¼–å†™ï¼Œé“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨ var p=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){ resolve(); }) var step=function(def){ def.then(function(){ return lightUp(3000,red); }).then(function(){ return lightUp(2000,green); entry.content: å¸¸è§æ’åºç®—æ³•å¯¹æ¯” æ’åºæ–¹æ³• å¹³å‡æƒ…å†µ æœ€å¥½æƒ…å†µ æœ€åæƒ…å†µ è¾…åŠ©ç©ºé—´ ç¨³å®šæ€§ å†’æ³¡æ’åº $O(n^2)$ $O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ ç¨³å®š æ’å…¥æ’åº $O(n^2)$ $O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ ç¨³å®š å¸Œå°”æ’åº $O(nlog_2n)â€“O(n^2)$ $O(n^{1.3})$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ ä¸ç¨³å®š é€‰æ‹©æ’åº $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ ä¸ç¨³å®š å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(log_2n)â€“O(n)$ ä¸ç¨³å®š å †æ’åº $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(1)$ ä¸ç¨³å®š å½’å¹¶æ’åº $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(nlog_2n)$ $O(n)$ ç¨³å®š å†’æ³¡æ’åºæ€è·¯1.ä¾æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒç›¸é‚»çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå°ï¼Œä¸å˜ã€‚å¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå¤§ï¼Œè°ƒæ¢é¡ºåºã€‚ä¸€è½®ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æœ€å¤§çš„æ•°ã€‚2.å¯¹é™¤äº†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä¹‹å¤–çš„æ•°é‡å¤ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œç›´åˆ°åªå‰©ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°function BubbleSort(arr){ for(var i=0;i<arr.length-1;i++){ for(var j=0;j<arr.length-1-i;j++){ if(arr[j]>arr[j+1]){ var temp=arr[j]; arr[j]=arr[j+1]; arr[j+1]=temp; } } } return arr;}æ’å…¥æ’åºæ€è·¯1.æŠŠæ•°ç»„åˆ†ä¸ºå·²æ’åºå’Œæœªæ’åºä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†,ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºå·²æ’åºï¼Œå…¶ä½™ä¸ºæœªæ’åºã€‚ 2.ä»æœªæ’åºå–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå’Œå·²æ’åºéƒ¨åˆ†æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œæ’å…¥åˆ°åˆé€‚çš„ä½ç½®function InsertSort(arr){ for(var i=1;i<arr.length;i++){ //ä»æœªæ’åºéƒ¨åˆ†å¼€å§‹ for(var j=i-1;j>=0&&a[j]>a[j+1];j--){ //å’Œå·²æ’åºéƒ¨åˆ†ä¾æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒ var temp=a[j]; a[j]=a[j+1]; a[j+1]=temp; } } return arr;}å¸Œå°”æ’åºæ€è·¯å¸Œå°”æ’åºæ˜¯æ’å…¥æ’åºçš„ä¸€ç§æ›´é«˜æ•ˆç‡çš„å®ç°ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒåœ¨äºé—´éš”åºåˆ—çš„è®¾å®šã€‚æ—¢å¯ä»¥æå‰è®¾å®šå¥½é—´éš”åºåˆ—ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åŠ¨æ€å®šä¹‰é—´éš”åºåˆ—ã€‚function ShellSort(arr){ for(var gap=Math.floor(arr.length/2);gap>0;gap=Math.floor(gap/2)){ for(var i=gap;i<arr.length;i++){ for(var j=i-gap;j>=0&&a[j]>a[j+gap];j-=gap){ var temp=a[j]; a[j]=a[j+gap]; a[j+gap]=temp; } } } return arr;} é€‰æ‹©æ’åºæ€è·¯1.æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°çš„æ•°ï¼Œå’Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªäº¤æ¢ä½ç½®ã€‚2.åœ¨å‰©ä¸‹çš„æ•°ä¸­ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€äºŒå°çš„æ•°ï¼Œæ”¾åœ¨ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªã€‚3.ä¾æ¬¡ç±»æ¨ï¼Œæ’å‡ºé¡ºåºã€‚function SelectSort(arr){ for(var i=0;i<arr.length-1;i++){ var minIndex=i; for(var j=i+1;j<arr.length;j++){ if(arr[j]<arr[minIndex]){ minIndex=j; } } var temp=arr[i]; arr[i]=arr[minIndex]; arr[minIndex]=temp; } return arr;}å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºæ€è·¯1.ä»¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºåŸºå‡†(ä¸­é—´çš„æ•°)ï¼Œæ¯”åŸºå‡†å°çš„æ”¾åˆ°å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œæ¯”åŸºå‡†å¤§çš„æ”¾åˆ°å³è¾¹ã€‚2.å†æŒ‰æ­¤æ–¹æ³•å¯¹è¿™ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®åˆ†åˆ«è¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿæ’åºï¼ˆé€’å½’è¿›è¡Œï¼‰ã€‚3.ä¸èƒ½å†åˆ†åé€€å‡ºé€’å½’ï¼Œå¹¶é‡æ–°å°†æ•°ç»„åˆå¹¶ã€‚function QuickSort(arr){ if(arr.length<2){ return arr; * this.left = this.right = null; * } *//** * @param {TreeNode} root * @return {number[]} */var preorderTraversal = function(root) { var res=[]; var stack=[]; if(root==null){ return []; } stack.push(root); while(stack.length){ root=stack.pop(); res.push(root.val); if(root.right!=null){ stack.push(root.right) } if(root.left){ stack.push(root.left) } } return res;};ä¸­åºâ€“leetcode94æ€è·¯ ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªè¾…åŠ©æ ˆstack å…ˆæŠŠrootå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡æŠŠå·¦è¾¹ç•Œå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œä»¤root=root.left é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2ï¼Œç›´åˆ°root==null,ä»stackå¼¹å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥è¿”å›æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”root=root.rightä»£ç var inorderTraversal = function(root) { var stack=[]; var res=[]; while(stack.length||root!=null){ if(root!=null){ stack.push(root); root=root.left; }else{ root=stack.pop(); res.push(root.val); root=root.right; } } return res;};ååºâ€“leetcode145æ€è·¯ è®°ä¸€ä¸ªè¾…åŠ©æ ˆæ˜¯s1ï¼Œå°†rootå‹å…¥s1 ä»s1å¼¹å‡ºçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹è®°ä¸ºcurï¼Œä¾æ¬¡å°†curçš„å·¦å­©å­å’Œå³å­©å­å‹å…¥s1 æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»s1å¼¹å‡ºçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ”¾å…¥å¦ä¸€ä¸ªs2ä¸­ï¼Œç›´åˆ°s1ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œä»s2ä¸­ä¾æ¬¡å¼¹å‡ºèŠ‚ç‚¹æ”¾å…¥è¿”å›æ•°ç»„ä»£ç var postorderTraversal = function(root) { if(root==null){ return []; } var res=[],s1=[],s2=[]; s1.push(root); while(s1.length){ root=s1.pop(); s2.push(root); if(root.left){ s1.push(root.left); } if(root.right){ s1.push(root.right); } } while(s2.length){ res.push(s2.pop().val); } return res;};äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å±‚æ¬¡éå†â€“leetcode102æ€è·¯ å®½åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†ï¼Œè®°ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—queue è®°å½•å½“å‰é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå³äºŒå‰æ ‘æ¯ä¸€å±‚ä¸Šçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°, ä»queueå‡ºé˜Ÿ æ¯å‡ºé˜Ÿä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå‘é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å‹å…¥å…¶å·¦å³å­©å­ä»£ç var levelOrder = function(root) { if(root==null){ return []; } var queue=[],res=[]; queue.push(root); while(queue.length){ var len=queue.length; var temp=[]; for(var i=0;i<len;i++){ var node=queue.shift(); temp.push(node.val); if(node.left){ queue.push(node.left); } if(node.right){ queue.push(node.right); } } res.push(temp); } return res;};äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„é”¯é½¿å½¢å±‚æ¬¡éå†â€“leetcode103æ€è·¯å‚è€ƒä¸Šä¸€é¢˜å±‚æ¬¡éå†ï¼Œå¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å¿—å˜é‡ï¼Œæ”¹å˜æ¯ä¸€å±‚è¾“å‡ºé¡ºåºã€‚var zigzagLevelOrder = function(root) { if(root==null){ return []; } var queue=[],res=[],flag=true; queue.push(root); while(queue.length){ var temp=[]; var len=queue.length; for(var i=0;i<len;i++){ var node=queue.shift(); temp.push(node.val); if(node.left){ queue.push(node.left); } if(node.right){ queue.push(node.right); } } if(!flag){ temp.reverse(); } flag=!flag; res.push(temp); } return res;};

entry.content: é¢˜ç›®ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² sï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ° s ä¸­æœ€é•¿çš„å›æ–‡å­ä¸²ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾ s çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ä¸º1000ã€‚ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼šè¾“å…¥: â€œbabadâ€ è¾“å‡º: â€œbabâ€æ³¨æ„: â€œabaâ€ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼šè¾“å…¥: â€œcbbdâ€ è¾“å‡º: â€œbbâ€æ€è·¯åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€å­—æ¯å’ŒäºŒå­—æ¯çš„å›æ–‡ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰¾åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ä¸‰å­—æ¯å›æ–‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¾æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚var longestPalindrome = function(s) { var start=0; var maxLength=1; var len=s.length; if(s.length<2){ return s; } var dp=new Array(len); for(var k=0;k<dp.length;k++){ dp[k]=new Array(len); } for(var i=0;i<len;i++){ dp[i][i]=true; if(i<len-1&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(i+1)){ dp[i][i+1]=true; start=i; maxLength=2; } } for(var strlen=3;strlen<len;strlen++){ for(var i=0;i<=len-strlen;i++){ var j=i+strlen-1; if(dp[i+1][j-1]&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(j)){ dp[i][j]=true; start=i; maxLength=strlen; } } } return s.substring(start,start+maxLength);}ä¸­å¿ƒæ‰©å±•ç®—æ³•å›æ–‡ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä¸¤ä¾§äº’ä¸ºé•œåƒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å›æ–‡å¯ä»¥ä»ä»–çš„ä¸­å¿ƒå±•å¼€ï¼Œæœ‰$2n-1$ä¸ªè¿™æ ·çš„ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬å­—æ¯å’Œå­—æ¯ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰å–ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹å‘ä¸¤è¾¹æ‰©æ•£çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ±‚å‡ºå…¶æ»¡è¶³å›æ–‡çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚var longestPalindrome = function(s) { if (s === '') { return ''; } let start = 0, end = 0; for (let i = 0; i < s.length; i++) { let len1 = calc(s, i, i); let len2 = calc(s, i, i + 1); let len = Math.max(len1, len2); if (len > end - start) { start = i - Math.floor((len - 1) / 2); end = i + Math.floor(len / 2); } } return s.substring(start, end + 1);};function calc(s, i, j) { while (i > -1 && j < s.length && s[i] === s[j]) { --i; ++j; } return j - i - 1;}

entry.content: é¢˜ç›®Given a string, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.Examples: Given â€œabcabcbbâ€, the answer is â€œabcâ€, which the length is 3. Given â€œbbbbbâ€, the answer is â€œbâ€, with the length of 1. Given â€œpwwkewâ€, the answer is â€œwkeâ€, with the length of 3. Note that the answer must be a substring, â€œpwkeâ€ is a subsequence and not a substring.æ€è·¯è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªæ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆiï¼Œjï¼Œi éå†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œj è®°å½•æ— é‡å¤å­ä¸²çš„ä½ç½®èµ·ç‚¹ã€‚mapä¿å­˜æ— é‡å¤å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œå¹¶æ›´æ–°å…¶indexã€‚/** * @param {string} s * @return {number} */var lengthOfLongestSubstring = function(s) { if(s==""){ return 0; } var maxL=0; var list=new Map(); for(var i=0,j=0;i<s.length;i++){ if(list.has(s[i])){ j=Math.max(j,list.get(s[i])+1); } list.set(s[i],i); maxL=Math.max(maxL,i-j+1); } return maxL;}
